title: Good Guys Doll Logo
content:
After another watch through of the Child's Play movies, it got me thinking.. What is the font that's used for the good guys dolls logo? And then another thought struck me, typophile!

I have done some googling, but have come up empty.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323000422im_/http:/typophile.com/files/good_guys_logo_6472.png)

Thank you all!

Font: 

 Cooper Black Italic 

Solved By: 

 [oldnick](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323000422/http:/typophile.com/user/6470 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [good\_guys\_logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323000422/http:/typophile.com/files/good_guys_logo.png) | 88.18 KB |
author: Kccool2

comments.content: Looks like Copper Black Italic to me...
You legend!! thank you SO much! Massive Kudos to you!

Some cut of Cooper Black Italic.

Edit: double checking made me late...
I overlapped the font over my screen-grab above, and it lines up EXACTLY! I'm so grateful to the both of you for helping me! So so grateful!
